document.full_text: defending champion rafa nadal faces the only man to have beaten him at the french open on wednesday when robin soderling will have his 2009 triumph but also last year's final defeat rattling in his mind.
document.title: soderling to test nadal in final repeat
lines_and_colors: defending champion rafa nadal faces the only man to have beaten him at the french open on wednesday when robin soderling will have his 2009 triumph but also last year's final defeat rattling in his mind.
